message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, as it is worth $15000 to you. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $14000. This represents a remarkable saving and is my best offer for this unique opportunity. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
